```{r eval = FALSE}
# Installing phylogenetics packages
install.packages('ctv')
library('ctv')

update.views('Phylogenetics')
library(plyr)
```

```{r eval = FALSE}
x <- read.delim("Genotyping-007.010-01_copy.txt")
dim(x) #478 columns, 333 rows
x[1,1:17] # SNP data in rows 17 to 333
class(x[5,17]) # character
count(x$island) #  how many samples from each island there are
count(x[,333]) # how many of each base combination there are in a SNP column
```

```{r eval = FALSE}
subx <- x[1:3,17:333] # making subset to experiment with
str(subx)
subx[1,1] <- NA
subx[subx=="?"] <- NA
homz <- c("T:T", "C:C", "G:G", "A:A")
hetz <- c("T:A", "T:C", "T:G", "C:A", "C:T", "C:G", "A:T", "A:C", "A:G", "G:A", "G:T", "G:C")
count(subx, )
```
